law.catch_line: Right Of Appeal; Finalization Of Set Off
law.text: Any debtor shall have the right to appeal said action in accordance with the provisions of chapter thirty A; provided, however, that if the IV-D agency is the claimant agency, the debtor shall have the right to appeal said action only in accordance with the provisions of section seventeen of chapter one hundred and nineteen A. The claimant agency unless stayed by court order, shall finalize the set-off pursuant to section eight.
